column4: I love the idea of more releases. What's the difference between running Debian testing or unstable against Ubuntu?
Stability. Newer versions. Desktop integration. Blah blah. Blah.
blah blah blah? Not what I was expecting. No compelling reason then.
I'm not much into advocating this or that distro. Try out whichever sounds right and make your own decision. At least that's my approach.
